scripts.build: rm -rf ./client-main/out && cd client-main && yarn electron-builder && open .
scripts.build-win: (if exist .\client-main\out rd /s /q .\client-main\out) && cd .\client-main && yarn build && yarn electron-builder && start .
scripts.install-all: yarn install && cd webpack && yarn install && cd ../client-main && yarn install && cd ../client-renderer && yarn install && cd ../server-main && yarn install && cd ../server-renderer && yarn install && cd .. && cd shared && yarn install && cd ..
